content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeIn” iron_row_type=”in_container” iron_remove_padding_small=”mobilenopadding” css=”.vc_custom_1529514400448{margin-top: 75px !important;}” el_class=”sonaar_templates_audioplayer001″][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531345992282{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sainte Vie – Through – EP” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” fit_bg_text=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1635346545436{margin-top: -40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1552331950563{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346595779{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Artist: Sainte Vie
Title: Through
Label: Akumandra
Cat-No: AK005
Format: 12” Vinyl + Digital
Release Date: October 15, 2021
Artwork: F3 STUDIO

Tracklist:
A1: Heart
B1: Phantom[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”white”][vc_btn title=”BUY NOW” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_background=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_text=”#000000″ shape=”square” align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1637319462952{padding-top: 40px !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffanlink.to%2FAK005_SainteVie_Through_OUTNOW||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200938090{padding-top: 30px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Through

by Sainte Vie
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1529520171264{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346518326{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]With his third EP, THROUGH, Mexican musician Pablo Pina, best known as Sainte Vie, plunges deeper into music’s power to evoke emotions and make memories come to life.

Both tracks that make up the EP are high-energy, innovative soundscapes. In Heart, a syncopated kick groove and filtered drum roll, accompanied by unusual synth arpeggios create an ethereal atmosphere that is completed by a ghostly vocal recitation of a mystical poem. The unorthodox chord progression in Phantom establishes a mysterious, eerie mood until a synth with an LFO emulating an emotional vocal propels the track into catharsis at the break of the song.

Sainte Vie’s masterful blending of melancholia and euphoria simultaneously manifests the excitement of a live set and the deep thoughtfulness of meditation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeIn” iron_row_type=”in_container” iron_remove_padding_small=”mobilenopadding” css=”.vc_custom_1529514400448{margin-top: 75px !important;}” el_class=”sonaar_templates_audioplayer001″][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531345992282{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Kapoor & Hvitling – The Odyssey ” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” fit_bg_text=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1637319521218{margin-top: -40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1552331950563{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346256040{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Artist: Kapoor & Hvitling
Title: The Odyssey
Label: Akumandra
Cat-No: AK004
Format: 2 x 12” Vinyl + Digital
Release Date: May 20th 2021
Artwork: Diego Cíntora & Eli Sopcich

Tracklist:
A1: 1985
A2: Nightfall
B1: Eldingar
B2: Predator/Prey
C1: Vox Diaboli
C2: The Wolf You Feed
D1: Vox Angeli
D2: This is the End[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”white”][vc_btn title=”BUY NOW” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_background=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_text=”#000000″ shape=”square” align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1637319534056{padding-top: 40px !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffanlink.to%2FKapoorHvitling_TheOdyssey_AK004||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200938090{padding-top: 30px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

The Odyssey

by Kapoor & Hvitling
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1529520171264{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346302523{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]Kapoor and Hvitling’s first album, The Odyssey, is monumental. It boasts eight tracks that are generous in terms of length and sophistication. Each has a distinctive feel and predominant mood, balancing intricate sonic arrangements with dynamic and rhythmically pleasant beats.

Yet certain ethereal sound textures and melodies make the tracks echo each other, creating a sense of journeying through uncharted waters. Masterfully produced female vocal synths become spectral presences in several tracks, most notably in Vox Diaboli and Vox Angeli.

In the former, seductive whispers hiss a rhymed incantation, creating a delightfully spooky atmosphere; while the latter lures the listener into sacred ecstasy with a combination of vibrant synths pristinely arranged with a string orchestra and LFO female vocals.

Akumandra’s fourth official vinyl release stays true to its multicultural essence, adding this young Polish and Swedish producer duo to their vinyl catalog.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeIn” iron_row_type=”in_container” iron_remove_padding_small=”mobilenopadding” css=”.vc_custom_1529514400448{margin-top: 75px !important;}” el_class=”sonaar_templates_audioplayer001″][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531345992282{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sainte Vie – From Desolate Places and Forgotten Times – EP” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” fit_bg_text=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1596201200549{margin-top: -40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1552331950563{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346320826{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Artist: Sainte Vie
Title: From Desolate Places and Forgotten Times
Label: Akumandra
Cat-No: AK003
Format: 12” Vinyl + Digital
Release Date: July 16th 2019
Artwork: Vahan Stepanyan (Rambalkoshe) & Manuela Villazon
Mastering: Hans-Philipp

Tracklist:
A1: High Seas (09:55)
B1: Whale (08:39)
B2: Darko (07:48)[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”white”][vc_btn title=”BUY NOW” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_background=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_text=”#000000″ shape=”square” align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1596129214611{padding-top: 40px !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffanlink.to%2Fsainte-vie-from-desolate-places-and-forgotten-times-ak003||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200938090{padding-top: 30px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

From Desolate Places and Forgotten Times

by Sainte Vie
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1529520171264{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346331539{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]The latest release by the Mexican avant-garde label Akumandra is founder Sainte Vie’s three track auditive voyage: From Desolate Places and Forgotten Times. Going beyond previous experimentation with sound assemblage and sampling from non-western musical traditions, Sainte Vie crafts his signature mesmerizing soundscapes by combining dreamlike synth textures, monumental drops and vibrant melodies that feel deeply melancholic. Insistent arpeggios and expansive build ups bind the tracks together in an ebb and flow of dynamic energy.

High Seas
Overlaid synth patterns, like waves, propel us into a mixed-percussion drop that settles on a harmonic calm before another surge of synth arpeggios drive us farther along into the thrilling sensation of voyage.

Whale
Disembodied vocals, like cetaceans communicating, echo each other, creating a ghostly undercurrent to the vigorous percussion and futuristic synth arpeggios.

Darko
Backed by an eerie melody and punctuated by a lead-heavy bass drum, a deep, guttural voice plunges us into the dark flow of time.

Spectral in theme and profoundly engaged with the sensorial quality of music, Sainte Vie’s EP transports the listener to a place that feels distant like uncharted waters, yet familiar like a memory.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeIn” iron_row_type=”in_container” iron_remove_padding_small=”mobilenopadding” css=”.vc_custom_1529514400448{margin-top: 75px !important;}” el_class=”sonaar_templates_audioplayer001″][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531345992282{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Kleintierschaukel – Drum ‘N’ Feels EP” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” fit_bg_text=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1596201523247{margin-top: -40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1552331950563{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346378957{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Artist: Kleintierschaukel
Title: Drum ‘N’ Feels
Label: Akumandra
Cat-No: AK002
Format: 12” Vinyl + Digital
Release Date: Vinyl (September 18th 2019) Digital (September 24th 2019)
Artwork: Diego Cíntora & Eli Sopcich
Mastering: Hans-Philipp

Tracklist:
A1: Long Time Ago (feat Johannes Ton)
A2: Crazy Dayz (feat Chrischou)
B1: Kidz Of Tibet (feat Badau)
B2: Buffi And The Dolphins[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”white”][vc_btn title=”BUY NOW” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_background=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_text=”#000000″ shape=”square” align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1596201447104{padding-top: 40px !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Ffanlink.to%2FKleintierschaukel_Drum_N_Feels_AK002||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200873862{padding-top: 30px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Kleintierschaukel – Drum ‘N’ Feels AK002

by Sainte Vie
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1529520171264{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346363084{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]Kleintierschaukel’s first release on Akumandra presents an unstable proximity to the archaic, with equatorial acoustics that modulate between organic and synthetic states. Drum’N’Feels is about the re-enchantment of culturally heavy sampling – an acknowledgment to an indigenous sound that warps the perception of home and away.

The first track, Long Time Ago, utilizes sporadic square waves as the engine and embellishes with a series of sensory sound cyclones.

Crazy Dayz is an auditory story telling of an event horizon that is never fully approached. Arbitrary vocals and low swells allude to the dynamic haze of nighttime euphoria.

The syncopated guitar strum provides an omnipresent reality to Kidz of Tibet – a deconstruction of a desolate, desert melody to form a vacant audio-synthesis.

Buffi and the Dolphins, the final track of the EP, is a full-bodied submersion into subterranean liquid percussion. The splurge on cavernous sampling builds the frequency layers needed for this multi-textural sound.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css_animation=”fadeIn” iron_row_type=”in_container” iron_remove_padding_small=”mobilenopadding” css=”.vc_custom_1529514400448{margin-top: 75px !important;}” el_class=”sonaar_templates_audioplayer001″][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1531345992282{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sainte Vie – Estación Inmortal EP” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” fit_bg_text=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200823322{margin-top: -40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1552331950563{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346390533{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Artist: Sainte Vie
Title: Estación Inmortal
Label: Akumandra
Cat-No: AK001
Format: 12” Vinyl + Digital
Release Date: January 29th 2018
Artwork: Diego Cíntora
Mastering: Hans-Philipp

Tracklist:
A1: Huracán (12:02)
B1: Albatross (07:17)
B2: María (feat. Pascale)(05:39)[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”white”][vc_btn title=”BUY NOW” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_background=”#ffffff” outline_custom_hover_text=”#000000″ shape=”square” align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1529525834029{padding-top: 40px !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffanlink.to%2Fsainte-vie-estacion-inmortal-ak001||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1596200873862{padding-top: 30px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Estación Inmortal

by Sainte Vie
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1529520171264{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1635346401336{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]As a brief epilogue, Akumandra promotes the exceptional artists riding the sub current of multicultural electronic music and, after 3 years of sharing its music for free, it’s about to release on vinyl for the first time.

As the twilight scene of music is in constant evolution, Akumandra is ever present with a distinct vibrant sound, ready to infuse new space.

Sainte Vie’s music is a prime summary of what it means to hear in a post-genre universe. As trends are quickly rendered obsolete, the accumulation of culture debris is becoming more significant in relation to the producer – the ability to create a nostalgic blur through a composition of artifacts and interpretations. Paying homage to this, Estación Inmortal (Sainte Vie’s first EP) produces the afterglow associated with an auditory epiphany. The combination of mellow interludes, earthy chord progressions and acoustic-synthetic equilibrium have the capacity to conquer both communal space and solitude.

Huracán, the first track of the EP, introduces aeolian riffs and a tribalistic repertoire to an abstract house backbone, whilst the vocals transform the production into a ritualistic summoning.

Albatross, explores saturated landscapes through a blend of miscellaneous percussion and raptured harps – the lower piano keys providing the infectious melody line. María, a collaboration with Pascale Ussel and the final track of the EP, stars a seductive vocal intercepted by retrograde lows and a melodic bass line reminiscent of the post-prog 90s bass.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
